CopilotInsight: CX is a therapist and mostly uses Teams for his sessions He is not aware of Copilot so I introduced him to Copilot on Teams to help him easily take notes during sessions summarize sessions dialogue and be able to follow up on what was discussed and agreed upon with clients He is interested and keen to use Copilot as it will ease his workload of typing notes as he talks with the client and concentrate on the main task which is counselling the client
Copilot Insights comment: The insight is valid as it provides specific information about how Copilot can help the therapist by taking notes and summarizing session dialogues, which impacts his workflow by allowing him to focus more on counseling. It is actionable, customer-centric, connected to the business goals of the therapist, and detailed enough to be useful.

CopilotInsight: For an architecture firm it's evident that efficient project management secure document handling and advanced modeling capabilities are crucial To enhance these capabilities I recommend leveraging Copilot in OneDrive This tool assists in automating routine tasks analyzing data and improving collaboration ensuring that complex architectural projects are implemented efficiently and securely The customer has shown considerable interest in exploring Copilot further to boost their operational efficiency and project success
Copilot Insights comment: The entry is valid as it provides specific insights into how Copilot can enhance project management, secure document handling, and advanced modeling capabilities for an architecture firm. It also connects Copilot's features to the business needs and goals of the customer, making it actionable and customer-centric.
